citations.narrative:
The contingency plan provided during inspection had not been reviewed on at least on annual basis. The date of last
review was 28 December 2022. Failure to review the contingency plan on at least an annual basis may lead to inadequate
preparation and knowledge of staff on how to safeguard animals during emergencies resulting in poor handling and
management of the animals. The plan must be reviewed by the exhibitor on at least an annual basis to ensure that it
adequately addresses the criteria listed in paragraph (a) of 2.134.
Correct by 19 February 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The contingency plan provided during inspection had not been reviewed on at least on annual basis. The date of last 
review was 28 December 2022. Failure to review the contingency plan on at least an annual basis may lead to inadequate 
preparation and knowledge of staff on how to safeguard animals during emergencies resulting in poor handling and 
management of the animals. The plan must be reviewed by the exhibitor on at least an annual basis to ensure that it 
adequately addresses the criteria listed in paragraph (a) of 2.134. 
 
Correct by 19 February 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
